originalText.text: I am all about body positivity and Goals catered to that. From curiosity to completion, they followed me through the journey. They understood that I just wanted to improve on what I had and honored that. The day of the procedure was quick and easy and everything I would need was included In my package so I didn't have to worry about buying unnecessary stuff. The aftercare is also a breeze with friendly staff explaining everything and I was back up and running in 72 hrs. I'm definitely ready for summer and the beach now.

originalText.text: I would provide zero stars if possible. They changed my procedure time and place just days before the procedure. My procedure was on a Friday and scheduled/paid for months in advance. The post op massage was to take place in ridge field. I drove over 2 hours and even got an Airbnb for this procedure. Just to be told they don‚Äôt do massages on Saturday at the ridge field location (this was scheduled by the company months ago). Fast forward to Sunday, they rescheduled my massage to another location in Ny which is extremely inconvenient. They stated they do not provide refunds so you are essentially stuck. It‚Äôs been over 48 hours, I had to YouTube how to drain myself because I was leaking fluid everywhere i went. And now I am also losing money because I have to continue to call out of work. Please be mindful when choosing where to have your procedures done. Also, I have yet to receive any post op care instructions. I don‚Äôt see how I had to provide payment and lab results so urgently and now i can‚Äôt even get someone on the phone to resolve this ongoing matter. Ladies, take my experience and learn from it and go spend your money with a company who will reach out just as urgently to confirm your well being as they do when you need to make a payment.

originalText.text:
I wished I could give zero stars. The staff are rude and never follow back with you, I had Stephanie as my provider, she never got back to me, found out she left goals and blocked my number.

Their services are AWFUL, BTW. Search them up on the internet. They have lots of death rates and none of the doctors are board certified. DONT let the cheap prices foool you. Most of the time their services are a scam, they only work decent on influencers and celebrities.  They are not qualified and they will steal your money.

Do your research before thinking about scheduling any surgery dates with them. I made that mistake by dropping a deposit. But I would rather lose $500 than lose my life. The choice is yours.

originalText.text: I had surgery with you and you did a month, and you do not leave the patients as you teach in your networks, they left me the same as I was, I have no bbl and I am just as fat as I was and I only have 1 month since I had surgery. even no one has come back to me. call I had to see the doctor in 1 month and no one gave me or made an appointment. I lost my money with you, the girls are nothing like the way you upload them. It's like it's marketing. I was completely dissatisfied twice, I lost my money with you, the first time was because I did not take the local anesthesia and we had to postpone the appointment and I asked for more than 4 thousand dollars with you and they only reimbursed me 300 dollars. I called and no one told me anything until they spoke to me badly, and they told me that I should wait. I am honestly very dissatisfied, I hate this experience. I lost my money, which I obtained with a lot of sacrifice, I lost all my money and I did not get the results that I expected, they left me the same, sometimes I cry and it is because of the incredible disappointment that it took me to spend my money and my time with you and they did nothing to me and when I call no one answers me no one tells me nothing nothing
